item.title: Getting started with facebook-graph-api
item.description: Installation or Setup # Detailed instructions on getting facebook-graph-api set up or installed.

item.title: Display Facebook feed, data on your website
item.description: Getting FaceBook Access Token to read and write to the Facebook social graph # This document details the steps to obtain the facebook access tokens and the using the tokens to fetch FB feeds. Example: A live example is available in https://newtonjoshua.com Introduction to Graph API: The Graph API is the primary way to get data in and out of Facebook’s platform. It’s a low-level HTTP-based API that you can use to query data, post new stories, manage ads, upload photos and a variety of other tasks that an app might need to do.
